title: The Intersection of National Security and the Global Economy
abstract: Serving at a critical juncture in our nation’s history, Admiral Mike Mullen, America’s top military advisor to the President and the Secretary of Defense through two administrations, was a key influencer in shaping the security of our nation for decades to come. A man of unparalleled experience, vision and integrity, Mullen shares with audiences his belief that, “Our financial health is directly related to our national security,” and discusses how the key to the United States’ economic success in the next century is to create opportunity. With an eye on the horizon and to the threats that still lie ahead, Mullen discusses America’s greatest challenges—economic growth, infrastructure, education and foreign and military policy.

surveys.comments: Could have tied it better to the theme of the conference

While I respect the Admiral's service to country and wealth of experience, his talk was neither relevant nor terribly focused. 
Not a great keynote.
